Name: Jewel Match Twilight 3 Collector's Edition
About the game: Send shivers down your spine... with this creepy-crawly Match-3 quest that will chill you to the bone and make your flesh crawl. Discover eerie scenes and restore abandoned buildings, but beware of marauding creatures in the dark land. Traverse huge levels in search of items needed to solve your quest. Find keys to unlock secret passages, use mighty power-ups, and decipher mind-bending puzzle challenges in this innovative Match-3 experience! Play puzzle and crystal levels to unlock hidden object and jigsaw minigames and earn spooky decorations! Delve into the deepest caves of the levels to discover lava vials, conveyor belts, ghost balloons, and more! Search the dark, cobwebby corners of every last level for gems and coins and make your hair stand on end with Jewel Match Twilight 3! Features: - Explore 180 huge levels! - 55 additional bonus levels with new game features! - 3 different playmodes: timed, relaxed, and moves limited! - 2 difficulty settings: normal and veteran. - Restore 9 eerie scenes. - Buy dozens of upgrades and power-ups from the shop. - Replayable mini-games games, including jigsaw and hidden object scenes. - Beautiful wallpapers. - Haunting soundtrack.
